<script>import { badgeVariants } from "./index.js";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  href,
  class: className,
  variant = "default",
  children,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<svelte:element
	this={href ? "a" : "span"}
	bind:this={ref}
	{href}
	class={cn(badgeVariants({ variant, className }))}
	{...restProps}
>
	{@render children?.()}
</svelte:element>
